hero.title: Kaikki yhdessä -ratkaisu yhdistyksesi hallintaan
hero.description: Yhdisteri helps associations manage member registers, handle billing, and streamline operations all in one place.

features.title: Kaikki mitä tarvitset yhdistyksen hallintaan
features.description: Yhdisteri provides all the tools you need to manage your association efficiently.
features.memberManagementDescription: Keep track of all your members, their contact information, and membership status in one place.
features.billingAndPaymentsDescription: Send invoices, track payments, and manage your association's finances with ease.
features.eventManagementDescription: Create and manage events, handle registrations, and send reminders to participants.
features.reportingAndAnalyticsDescription: Get insights into your association's performance with detailed reports and analytics.
features.gdprComplianceDescription: Ensure your member data is handled in compliance with GDPR regulations.
features.communicationToolsDescription: Send emails, newsletters, and notifications to your members directly from the platform.

howItWorks.title: Yksinkertainen ja intuitiivinen prosessi
howItWorks.description: Get started with Yhdisteri in just a few simple steps.
howItWorks.signUpDescription: Create your account and set up your association profile with basic information.
howItWorks.importMembersDescription: Import your existing member data, send invite links to your members or start adding members manually to your register.
howItWorks.startManagingDescription: Begin using all features to manage members, billing, events, and communications.

testimonials.title: Mitä asiakkaamme sanovat
testimonials.description: Read what our customers have to say about Yhdisteri.
testimonials.quote1: Yhdisteri has completely transformed how we manage our sports club. The member management and billing features have saved us countless hours.
testimonials.quote2: As a small cultural association, we needed an affordable solution that could handle all our needs. Yhdisteri delivered beyond our expectations.
testimonials.quote3: The GDPR compliance features give us peace of mind, and the reporting tools help us make better decisions for our student organization.

pricing.title: Valitse yhdistyksellesi sopiva suunnitelma
pricing.description: We offer a range of plans to suit different sizes and needs of associations.
pricing.starterDescription: For small associations with basic needs.
pricing.professionalDescription: For medium-sized associations with moderate needs.
pricing.enterpriseDescription: For large associations with complex needs.

faq.title: Usein kysytyt kysymykset
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Yhdisteri.
faq.answer1: Absolutely. Yhdisteri is built with GDPR compliance in mind. We provide tools to manage consent, data access requests, and the right to be forgotten.
faq.answer2: Yes, you can customize invoice templates with your association's logo and specific information to maintain your brand identity.
faq.answer3: Yes, depending on your plan, you can have multiple admin users with different permission levels to manage various aspects of your association.
faq.answer4: Yhdisteri is fully responsive and works on all devices but we are working on a mobile app.
faq.answer5: Yes, you can import your existing member data from Excel, CSV, or other formats. We also offer assistance with data migration for larger associations.

cta.title: Ready to transform your association?
cta.description: Join other associations already using Yhdisteri to streamline their operations.

footer.description: Yhdisteri is a platform for managing associations. It helps associations manage member registers, handle billing, and streamline operations all in one place.
